Page 877

This Electronic Message contains information from a Law Office of [redacted] P.C., and may be privileged. The information is intended for the use of the addressee only. If you are not the addressee, please note that any disclosure, copying, distribution, or use of the contents of this message is prohibited.

From: [redacted] @bop.gov
Sent: Saturday, August 10, 2019 1:57 PM
To: [redacted] @att.net [redacted] @steptoe.com [redacted] @usdoj.gov [redacted] @usdoj.gov [redacted] @usdoj.gov
Subject: United States v. Jeffrey Epstein

Good afternoon,

Enclosed please find official notification from Warden N'Diaye regarding Mr. Epstein's passing. As the investigation is ongoing, we have no further details at this time. We will continue to keep you updated as more information is available.

Thank you,
[redacted]
Supervisory Staff Attorney
CLC New York
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
p: (646)836-[redacted]
f: (646)836-7665
